name: C-Kiosk #1 Anonymous Browser
short_description:
C-Kiosk Anonymous Browser is a lightweight web-scripted interface to browse the World Wide Web Anonymously . It is purposefully built to be simple HTTP proxy easy to use. It is used in programs requiring a interface design over a normal web browser.See blocked websites like facebook twitter youtube....Anonymous Web Proxy Server
our Pro service will be available soon
our product will be available for Android
====================================
V2 Features:
Using Webkit
HTML5 support
Multi-Tab support
New CSS features support

Prerequisites:
1.Microsoft® .NET Compact Framework 3.5 Redistributable
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=65
2.Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 MFC
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=26347
================================
V1
Prerequisites:
1.Microsoft® .NET Compact Framework 3.5 Redistributable
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=65

Using IE
